title: Assessment Task Redesign Workshop for Art and Design Professional Competency Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental theories and practical experience in art/design fields
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields develop art-technology integrated assessment tools in science domains.

learning_goals: Learners can create and execute self-regulated learning plans based on a practical ecological framework with over 80% engagement
Learners design three or more assessment tasks that solve complex real-world problems using portfolios and blog journals
The peer feedback system derives criteria for measuring professional development through learner collaboration with 90% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
